title: Our Project Aims to Develop Activities and Initiatives to Build a Strong, Equitable, and Sustainable Ecosystem for hls4ml.

content.title: Networking & Training
content.content: Through this POSE grant we are developing a series of networking and training events for trainees in the areas of science and engineering domains and current and future users of hls4ml.

content.title: Examples & Tutorials
content.content: The amount and variety of design examples and tutorial projects will be extended significantly in order to supply the community with a solid toolbox for the longer term to become productive and efficient users and contributors of hls4ml beyond the timeline of the NSF funded period.

content.title: Technical Support
content.content: Throughout the grant's duration we will also provide technical support through a dedicated staff member for code maintenance and development needs of contributors of hls4ml.

content.title: Curricular Components
content.content: Curricular components developed by our project's team members will be shared with programs throughout our network.
